revised_title: An Analysis of Kidney Stones in Mrs. Felles
tldr: This article describes the case of Mrs. Felles, who had enlarged kidneys filled with stones. The author, Noah Sherwood, details the process of removing the stones and the condition of the surrounding tissues. He also discusses the patient's symptoms and the overall impact of the stones on her body. This case study provides insight into the medical understanding of kidney stones during the 18th century.
